SlopeCalculation.title: SlopeCalculation
SlopeCalculation.description: Represents a slope calculation with input parameters and results.

userId.description: The UID of the user who made the calculation.

x1.description: The x-coordinate of the first point.

y1.description: The y-coordinate of the first point.

x2.description: The x-coordinate of the second point.

y2.description: The y-coordinate of the second point.

slope.description: The calculated slope of the line.

angle.description: The calculated angle of the line in degrees.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the calculation was performed.
